title: Hans Sloane and the British Museum
itunes:title: Hans Sloane and the British Museum
itunes:subtitle: Author and historian James Delbourgo discusses his new book Collecting the World, which explores the life of the 18th-century natural historian Hans Sloane whose collections went on to form the basis of the British Museum in London
description:
Author and historian James Delbourgo discusses his new book Collecting the World, which explores the life of the 18th-century natural historian Hans Sloane whose collections went on to form the basis of the British Museum in London

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
